sugawara:physicaldata: ゆnum_old　 印花　khanya　官衙への申告（粘結なし）

sugawara:seal: mkd005(Qadi Damolla 'Abd Allah b. Sabil 'Ali merhum)
schema:abstract: 31, Real Estate transfer(sale), Dhu al-hijja 17, 1364(Nov.23, 1945), issued by Mu'azzin Ya'qub Hajjim valad-i 'Abd al-Qahar Hajjim merhum of Tiwe Khane mahalla, to Nur Akhund valad-i Imin Akhund, on a one -room of shop locates at Tiwe Khane mahalla.
